examples.example: 我很喜欢参加社交活动，因为这样可以认识很多有趣的人并和他们交朋友。

translate.english: I really like to participate in social activities, because in this way I can meet many interesting people and make friends with them.

examples.example: 我热衷于参加各种聚会，因为这是一个很好的交朋友的机会。

translate.english: I am keen on attending various parties, because this is a very good opportunity to make friends.
